alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 1:31AM CDT until June 15 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... York County in east central Nebraska... Southeastern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Polk County in east central Nebraska... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 131 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hampton, or 16 miles west of York, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Henderson around 135 AM CDT. Bradshaw around 140 AM CDT. York around 150 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Benedict, Waco and Gresham. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 332 and 365. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
